Course content 
1.Introduction 
2.Reflection and Refraction 
3.Imaging 
4.Ploariztion 
5.Interference and Dissraction
6.optical power Meter
7.Laser characteistic 
8.Fiber End preparation 
9.Fiber NA 
10.Fiber Loss 
11.Fiber connector 
12.Fiber optic communication 
13.apecial Topics

description.zh: 本課程目標針對大一新生入門介紹建築專業分支領域。由建築學基本涵構作概略介紹，輔以案例介紹及適當實地參觀研討，進而了解建築學相關知識體系，並對未來四年建築專業課程內容有全盤性認識，進ㄧ步結合未來出路願景。著重訓練思考及觀察能力，以利學生認識建築學之整體關聯性，進而建立其全方位學習藍圖。內容包括建築相關產業與建造程序、體驗建築、建築單位尺寸、建築結構系統之美、建築設計風格、建築教育、新一代建築師、建築構造與材料、建築的社會文化性、建築與環境共生、建築與都市發展、建築相關法令等。
description.en: This course gives a brief introduction with those knowledge related architecture and construction for the freshmen of department of Architecture, that students may have a whole concept about each professional courses for the future 4 years. This course is focus on training the ability of thinking & observation of students to establish the integrated structure of Architecture.

description.zh: 本課程以教導學生認識建築材料與構造形式之實際操作為主。目的在於藉由實際接觸及操作真實材料時，對於材料種類、性質、加工過程、組裝知識、技術與美學等，具備基本知識與技術能力，並且能應用於建築設計課程。本課程內容依建築構造領域分為五項主題，內容如下：1.木工操作技術與流程介紹、2,金工操作技術與流程介紹、3.圬工操作技術與流程介紹、4.玻璃工程操作技術與流程介紹、5.室內裝修建材相關操作技術與流程介紹。
description.en:
The subject of this course is mainly to recognize the architectural materials and to practice the constructional forms. 
The purpose is to process the basic knowledge and technical abilities through contact and manipulate real materials, including the verity and quality of materials, manufacturing processes and the cognition, technique and aesthetic of fabricating. Besides, to apply them to the architecture design courses. 
Five topics will be selected from the field of architectural construction. 
Content: 1. Introduction to carpentry manipulating technique and process. 2. Introduction to metalworking manipulating technique and process. 3. Introduction to brickwork manipulating technique and process. 4. Introduction to glass manipulating technique and process. 5. Introduction to indoor construction materials' manipulating technique and process.

name.zh: 創意設計企劃實務講座（二）
name.en: Practice Forum of Creative Design Planning (II)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生一個與實務界交流的平台，協助學生體驗創意設計企劃的最佳實務。課程內容包括一系列的設計企劃、創意產業規劃與溝通理論等專題講座，和文化創意產業、創意設計機構與設計公司等實地參觀見習。
description.en: This course is to provide with a platform on which students can experience the best practice of design planning in creative industry. The contents include a series of sub-forums of design planning, creative industry planning, and communication theories, as well as study tours of creative industry, creative design organizations, and design agents.

notes: 三四合開(創意設計企劃實務學程)

name.zh: 逆向工程與快速原型（一）
name.en: Reverse Engineering and  Rapid prototyping Practice （一）

description.zh: 從點群掃描、建構曲面、實體、分析與檢測並轉出Stl檔等逆向工程流程到快速原型加工原理、系統分類做實務介紹與製造
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques used in Reverse Engineering (RE). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of RE, 3D measurement principles, surface digitization strategies, curve and surface modeling and the introduction of rapid prototyping system.

name.zh: 創新講座--產業參訪--文化創意產

description.zh: 文化創意產業是近年來政府所欲積極推動的新興工業，身為創新設計所一員的我們，必須去瞭解這類產業的特質在於其多樣性、小型化與分散式，並且嘗試將當代藝術的菁華融入其中。本課程是針對現今不同類型之文化創意產業，就人才培育、研究發展、資訊整合、財務資助、空間提供、產學合作介面等，透過參訪、研究與講座形式，提升學生對於兩個層面的認識。
description.en: As for the cultural creative industry, it has been a sunrise industry that the government actively boosts in the recent years. We have to understand the variety, miniaturization, and distribution of the characteristics in the type of industry. Besides, we try to combine it with the essence of contemporary art. This course aims to elevate students' understanding in two levels by visiting, researching, or holding extension courses about the different types of cultural artistic industries: talent nurture, research development, information integration, financial support, space supply, and industry-school cooperation.

description.zh:
創意人，是特質也是習慣，你也可以這樣。創意能力並非與生俱來的天賦異秉，許多鬼靈精怪的點子王，其實是經歷過扎實的思考訓練；許多看似天外飛來一筆的絕創意，背後往往有嚴密的發想邏輯。創意不一定改變了東西，有時只是改變了自己，改變了想法。
本課程邀請國內著名之創意大師，如王偉中、詹偉雄等名人，希望可以為同學帶來一些靈感、創意，讓生命更為精彩，更為亮麗。
description.en:
Creator, a character and a habit, is one kind of person you can be. Creativity is not what you born with. Many imaginative idea experts were going through tough thinking training; many brilliant ideas that came from a brainstorm were created from rigorous logical thinking. Creation is not all about changing things; sometimes it just changes oneself, and changes thoughts.
This course is going to invite famous National creative masters like Wang Wei-chung and Chan Wei-hsiung, hoping to offer the students some inspiration and creativity and making our life more wonderful and bright.

description.zh: 企業永續成長與經營的目標，端賴於管理階層具有前瞻性地視野、敏銳的策略規劃、健全的管理制度與人力資源充分有效的發揮。本課程旨在介紹一個企業集團如何創業、如何擴充其事業版圖、如何多角化經營，從單一事業到?跨建設營造、遊憩休閒、金融保險、空運物流、自由貿易港等跨業種的集團。課程進行是以演講的方式介紹該集團各事業體相關營運情形，並安排企業參訪，讓同學們得以一窺業界實務工作的全貌，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。
description.en: The goals of perpetual management and growth of an enterprise are depend upon the top level of vision, lean thinking and strategy planning, organization system integration, and manpower resource effective utilization. The objective of this course is to introduce the practice application and manage a business group, include property development and construction, recreation and leisure, finance and insurance, air cargo logistics, free trading port. To make students have a better understanding of these topics and promote the real world experience, the course proceeding by an invite lecture and business visiting for these issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

description.zh: 藉由參觀公司或工作場所，或至公司實習，瞭解產業之營運模式或經營成功之關鍵因素。
description.en: Understand operation model of industry and KSF(key success factor) by means of visiting company or working as an intern.

description.zh: 觀摩現今的全球化趨勢，並帶領學生學習企業家的國際觀與創業思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對於全球化發展的認知與瞭解。
description.en: To learn from a tendency of today's globalization and study from an entrepreneur's innovation and creation thinking, furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹網際網路的基本概念及相關實務的應用，透過網際網路相關軟體及應用領域的展示，使學生能增加對網際網路的瞭解，而充分運用其功能。課程內容涵蓋網際網路的基本概念、應用程式、網頁的製作及建置、網際網路的安全及未來發展。
description.en: This course will serve as a basic introduction to the Internet. The purpose of this course is to help students to gain a better understanding of the Internet, and to develop the advanced skills for navigating the Internet. It will survey various tools that are used to access the Internet. The course covers several major areas: information retrieval, electronic communication, file transfer, creating web pages, etc.  At the end of this course students will be prepared to demonstrate the ability to locate and use information using a variety of Internet tools and to critically evaluate information on the Internet.

description.zh: 本課程的授課內容如下：1.	木造技術發展史2.	2.磚造技術發展史3.	3.RC造技術發展史4.	4.鋼骨造技術發展史5.	混合構造技術發展史
description.en: The course content about followings:1.	Developmental history of wooden construction2.	Developmental history of brick construction3.	Developmental history of RC construction4.	Developmental history of steel construction5.	Developmental history of mixed construction

name.zh: 太陽光電池應用與展望
name.en: Technical progress and future prospect on solar photovoltaic

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生太陽能光電科技及能源相關產業及製程技術之實務知識。課程設計將著重基礎太陽能光電科技知識的建立,首先介紹太陽能光電科技所應具備之基本知識,並教授能源材料的基本特性及原理以及目前應用概況.藉由說明太陽能電池之設計原理與效率提高準則為出發點，教導學生了解太陽能光電科技所應用到之材料基本特性及相關製作程序。本課程將由本校專任教師配合企業講師和技術實務專業教師演講,透過實例之講解及工廠參觀，引導學生了解應用領域及製造產業。期盼培育學生迅速進入太陽能光電及能源材料相關產業工作能力與競爭力。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of solar energy technology. It intends to educate and train students with the fundamental theories and technical application of solar energy and solar- cell fabrication technology. The future prospect of photovoltaics will be revealed to help students understand strong demands in solar industries. The experienced industrial lectures will present the potential marketing, working principles of solar devices, and progress in commercialization of solar cells. Students will also be given the opportunities to on-site visit the solar-related industries.

description.zh:
圖學課程概述
【上學期】授課內容: 圖學基礎
著重於基礎圖學與繪圖能力的建構，並導入基本設計練習。
(理論上，視各位大一同學基本能力為零從頭教起)
教學內容:
字體、線條、平面造型、三視圖、立體圖、剖面、一點透視、二點透視、草模製作
【下學期】授課內容: 建築製圖
著重於建築設計常用圖面與表現法之繪製能力建立。
(本課程與下學期之大一建築設計、表現法相互接軌，其設計作品之圖面、模型部份作為本課程之作業成績)
教學內容:
陰影、速寫、景物描繪、平面圖、立面圖、剖面圖、分解圖、設計說明、配置、版面設計
description.en: The course objective is to train students understanding and fully employing the emerging technology of drawing methods in the architectural design process. The main topics base on CNS standards of Architectural drawing, and contents include: Site analysis, Plan, Section, etc. Finally, a series of exercises seeks to expand students' abilities to utilize various software packages of computer graphics.

description.zh:
藝術與新意的遇合，一切就從分享開始!
不論黑白彩色、平面立體、抽象具象、靜態動感，藝術一向變化多端，不論抒發情感、宣揚宗教、服務政治或是傳達思想，藝術從來不缺理由，別說你不懂藝術!因為在二十一世紀裡，藝術已不僅是貴婦們的權力，身為未來設計師與建築師的您們，應該積極讓藝術存在於你生活的週遭，不論分享美感經驗、探討觀點流派、解析藝術風格、從事文化創意設計，亦或是批判現今藝術社群，你都擁有發聲的權力。
而此系列講座中的十場演講，都是在不同藝術領域中，從事創作多年的佼佼者，透過大師講座的平台，讓大師們進入校園，與全校師生一同分享這藝術與新意的無限饗宴。
description.en:
When art meets innovation, everything starts from sharing!
No matter art is black or white, flat or three-dimensional, abstract or concrete, motionless or active, it has always been protean. When art is used to express feelings, advocate religions, propagandizing politics, or transmitting thoughts, it never needs any reason. Don't say that you don't know what art is! In the 21st century, art is no longer the privilege of wealthy ladies. But you all, the future designers and architects, should work harder to make yourself inseparable with art. When you are sharing your own experience about esthetics, exploring different art sects, analyzing art styles, engaging in cultural creative design, or criticizing the contemporary art sects, you have the right to speak up. 
The ten speeches in this series will be delivered by many experts from different fields. It would be our honor to have them in the campus and share their fruition of art with all of the staff and students.

description.zh: 透過設計專題的演練，發展學生整體的設計研究分析和創新設計專業能力。以設計研究為基礎，針對學生個別興趣專長選定專題，進行深入研究發展，完整演練新產品開發之過程，以期培養工業設計之專業。
description.en: This course aims to a thesis project within the practices areas of industrial design, chosen by the student in consultation with the program instructors. Projects are orientated towards specific interests that each student has developed. Each student will finalize their portfolio and aim at being of professional quality and range during the year.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹產品設計實務的工作內容，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提案，針對實務及就業準備，邀請產業主管或負責人講授，並配合工廠及設計工作室參觀，以培養其專業知識及技能，進而了解就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en:
The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a product design case, from planning, execution, management, coordination and final presentation. 
For career -prep, this class invites directors from renowned product manufacturers and product design studios to lecture design practice and vocational preparation. 
The course might also organize field trips to allow participants to experience future design environment.

notes: 三四合開(創意設計企劃實務學程)(產品設計工程學程)

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生瞭解：(1)流體靜力學之各種實驗、(2)流體運動現象之觀摩實驗、(3)流體能量及連續方程式之運用實驗、(4)流體動量－衝量方程式之運用實驗、(5)水力機械之測試實驗。
description.en: Fundamentals of fluid mechanics,Model similitude,Pipe flow,Open channel flow.

description.zh: 本課程由基本構造分析概念、運動力學分析、板塊構造等之介紹，進一步闡述斷層、節理、褶曲、劈理等構造現象。
description.en: The basic concept of structural dynamic analysis, introduction of plate tectonic and origin & characteristics of strata, fault, joints, fold and cleavage.

description.zh: 後補
description.en: 後補

description.zh: 環境工程主要介紹地球的生態、水污染、空氣污染及所具有的能源與原料。課程內容包括生態原理、生態系統、食物生產、水資源、水污染介紹、水處理、空氣污染介紹、空氣污染氣象、空氣污染防治技術、能源種類、電力、核能、未來的新能源、礦物資源。
description.en:
This class is designed to have students understand the air,
water and solid contamination in our globe system.  Various 
environmental protection and pollution control techniques 
are also introduced which include water, air and solid 
pollution control methods in various industries that are 
closely related to material and mineral industries.

description.zh:
本課程著重在材料的合成方式，包含人工晶體、人工合成天然礦物、各式新穎材料的合成法與結構解析。核心課程為：
(1)固態反應法
(2)氣相反應合成法
(3)液相反應合成法
(4)多孔性材料
(5)奈米材料
description.en:
This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various inorganic materials.
The core lectures include:
1. Solid-state reactions
2. Formation of solid from solutions and melts
3. Formation of solid from solutions and melts
4. Porous materials
5. Nanostructured materials

description.zh: 為加強學生設計實務能力，本課程規劃學生利用寒暑假期赴室內設計相關產業實習，實習期程至少50天，並於期滿後須由接受實習單位提具實習證明及成績考核。次一學期開學後，學生必須繳交書面或經PPT實習成果發表，由指導教師檢核實習單位成績考核，以給予實習學生最後評量成績。
description.en: For the purpose of enhance senior students' practical skill in interior design, the course is established to encourage students to intern in the industry for no less than 50 days. The student will then be evaluated by the industry, and by the lecturer through the examination of a written report and/or an oral P.P.T. presentation to demonstrate his/her effort.

notes: 生活空間設計實務與管理

description.zh: 本課程屬於生物技術的基礎課程，授課內容強調基本生化原理，介紹細胞組成份〈包括核酸、蛋白質、醣類和脂質〉的化學、生物活性及代謝，並分別闡明代謝作用與基因表現的調節機轉，輔以現今生化尖端學術研究的介紹，希望能以一學期的緊密課程，讓學生瞭解現代生化科技領域的輪廓，作為日後深造或從事生化科技行業的奠基。
description.en: A one-term introductory biochemistry course that covers the biochemistry of the living state; the chemistry of amino acids, proteins, nucleic acids, carbohydrates, lipids, and steroids; energy transformations and chemical reactions in living cells; action of hormones; and self-regulation and self-replication of living organisms.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

notes: 教師:盛竹玲,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓2F08
教師:朱九龍,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓1F09
教師:洪彩霞,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區社科大樓1F21
教師:辛法春,上課地點:台北大學台北民生校區202
教師:蘇建榮,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區社科大樓2F01
教師:王國新,上課地點:台北大學台北民生校區210

name.zh: 科學-技術-社會 教育與公民素養

notes: 教師:吳璧純,上課地點:台北大學台北民生校區205
教師:羅至美,上課地點:台北大學台北民生校區207
教師:洪彩霞,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區社科大樓1F21
教師:吳慧卿,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區商學大樓2F11
教師:王景智,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓4F09
教師:張貞雯,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓3F08

name.zh: 智慧財產權與社會生活

notes: 教師:廖麗芳,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓2F01
教師:葉義雄,上課地點:台北大學台北民生校區202
教師:朱九龍,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓1F09
教師:司仲敖,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓4F06
教師:陳守亭,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓4F07
教師:戴麗華,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區人文大樓2F08
教師:吳惠玲,上課地點:台北大學三峽校區商學大樓1F02

description.zh: 本課程將介紹window 作業系統之基本操作技巧，word 文書處理軟體、Excel計算表軟體及Power Point 簡報軟體製作之 基本應用。
description.en: The course introduces the basic operating skills of the window system and the application software such as word processors (MS WORD) spreadsheet calculators (Excel) and the prestation media (Power Point ).

description.zh: 汽車之動力性、汽車總論、引擎、底盤、傳動及電系、燃油經濟性、制動性、操縱穩定性、平順性及行駛性。
description.en: Automotive Service and Shop Work, Automobile Engines, Automobile Electrical and Electronic Equipment, Engine Performance and Drive-ability, Automotive Engine Service, Automotive Drive Trains, Automotive Chassis.

notes: 普通高中及非汽車科背景學生之先修課程

description.zh: 英語專業實習課程，兩學分的課程，提供學生將理論應用至實際的職場情境中。主旨在於利用實習工作實務，讓學生能應用理論及紮實的英語文能力，以為加強未來職場的競爭力及為專業領域的工作準備。課程中由老師或合作實習機構的專業人士從旁評估分析。學生在一學期中，最少需教學28-32個小時。學生在本課程結束完成後，學生們將會獲得由合作實習機構所頒發的專業實習證明。
description.en: English Professional Internship is a two-credit course, aiming to provide English-major students with abundant input in the workplace by working with field professionals in our affiliated institutions. By applying students' advanced English language proficiency with classroom-learned theories, this course further consolidates learning with real-life working experience in order to increase career competitiveness and to prepare students as future professionals. Students are required to work for a minimum of 28 to 32 hours, and will be granted a certificate by the department and the affiliated institutions.

description.zh:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）
2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.zh:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）
2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
